{{Description|"The law can restrict all manner of crimes, but it cannot extirpate evil itself.}}
'''O Tears, I Shall Repay''' is [[Neuvillette]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|Skill DMG|4}}
* Sourcewater Droplets generated by Neuvillette can be absorbed by the [[Hydro Traveler]] or [[Sigewinne]] and vice versa.
* Up to '''12''' Sourcewater Droplets spawned by Neuvillette can exist at one time. If more Sourcewater Droplets are created while there are 12 on the field, the oldest Sourcewater Droplets will despawn.
** Sourcewater Droplets spawned by other characters do not count towards this limit.
* In [[Co-Op Mode]], players can only see and interact with Sourcewater Droplets spawned by themselves.
